✱  Different groups can be involved – the local administrative bodies, womens’ 
groups, agricultural groups, etc in the discussions on foods and exercise. These 
groups can provide supports to motivate and sustain their health behaviours 
such as providing facilities for community exercise or making healthy foods available in the community. Religious leaders and community leaders can also be invited to give inputs.  It might also be useful to have participants who 
have either positive or negative experiences that would be  effective in raising 
group’s awareness. 
✱  The materials and documents used must be appropriate for the group.
